Wanti-wanti Tito Karnavian soal Peliknya Urusan Kapolri
02 Nov 2019, 07:10 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Kapolri Jenderal Idham Azis menerima pesan terkait jabatan baru yang diembannya. Mantan Kapolri yang kini menjabat Mendagri Tito Karnavian mengingatkan Idham Azis soal sederet tugas yang menanti.
"Selamat bertugas. Banyak pekerjaan yang harus dikerjakan oleh Pak Idham. Jadi Kapolri nggak gampang, karena internal saja harus ngurusin 450 ribu orang (personel)," kata Tito Karnavian di kompleks Istana, Jakarta Pusat, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Kapolri juga harus mengelola 34 Polda, lebih dari 500 Polres dan 5 ribu polsek di Indonesia. Kapolri sambung Tito harus memastikan tugas pokok menjaga keamanan dan ketertiban masyarakat serta pelayanan ke publik tetap optimal.
Kepada Idham Azis, Tito juga berpesan mengenai penanganan kejahatan-kejahatan konvensional, seperti begal dan illegal logging.
"Penegakan hukum itu nggak gampang di tengah negara yang sangat pluralistik, dan demokrasi yang cenderung bebas. Jadi permasalahan ideologis, politis, pilkada tahun depan 270 daerah itu akan banyak sekali. Lalu permasalahan kejahatan-kejahatan konvensional, seperti perampokan, begal, kekayaan negara, illegal logging, illegal fishing, masalah lingkungan. Kompleks sekali. Saya merasakan tiga tahun tiga bulan merasa cukup berat," tuturnya.
Tito juga menyatakan siap berkoordinasi dengan Idham Azis, untuk mengurus Pilkada Serentak 2020. Selain dengan Polri, Kemendagri akan bekerja sama dengan TNI di bawah pimpinan Panglima TNI Marsekal Hadi Tjahjanto.
"Pasti. Itu pasti dengan Pak Idham dan Panglima TNI," ujar Tito.
Dalam Pilkada Serentak 2020, ada 270 daerah yang menggelar pemilihan. Tito menyebut tinggal mengatur administrasi soal kerja sama dengan Polri dan TNI.

Tito Karnavian warned about the complicated nature of the National Police Chief
02 Nov 2019, 07:10 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - National Police Chief General Idham Azis received a message regarding his new position. Former National Police Chief who is currently serving as Minister of Home Affairs Tito Karnavian reminded Idham Azis about a series of tasks awaiting.
"Congratulations on duty. A lot of work must be done by Mr. Idham. So the National Police Chief is not easy, because internally alone must take care of 450 thousand people (personnel)," said Tito Karnavian at the Palace complex, Central Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019).
The Chief of Police also has to manage 34 regional police, more than 500 police and 5 thousand police in Indonesia. The National Police Chief, continued Tito, had to ensure that the main task of maintaining security and public order and serving the public remained optimal.
To Idham Azis, Tito also advised about handling conventional crimes, such as begal and illegal logging.
"Law enforcement is not easy in the midst of a very pluralistic country, and democracy tends to be free. So the problem of ideological, political, regional elections next year will be a lot of 270 regions. Then the problems of conventional crimes, such as robbery, begal, state wealth, illegal logging, illegal fishing, environmental problems. Very complex. I feel three years and three months feel quite heavy, "he said.
Tito also stated that he was ready to coordinate with Idham Azis, to take care of the Simultaneous Regional Election in 2020. In addition to the National Police, the Ministry of Home Affairs will cooperate with the TNI under the leadership of TNI Commander Marshal Hadi Tjahjanto.
"Certainly. That must be with Pak Idham and the TNI Commander," said Tito.
In the 2020 Simultaneous Local Elections, 270 regions held elections. Tito mentioned that it was only a matter of managing the administration in the matter of cooperation with the National Police and the TNI.
